title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 413: Featuring Marian Hossa + Ryan Reaves
description:
On Episode 413 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Marian Hossa and Ryan Reaves. Hossa joined (01:17:55) to discuss his career, losing back to back cups, his one year deal in Detroit and winning three in Chicago. But first, the guys are ambushed by Ryan Reaves (54:17) when he caught wind Biz was running his mouth and the guys discuss the possibility of a rough n rowdy match between the two. The boys also discuss Leafs/Trotz, Coyotes new barn, NHL news and tons more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
